title: in game
body: can you guys fix your match making bullshit cause everygame im with stupid people fix it you bitch fucks

replies.body: Wow... that's pretty salty for sure. Although for what it's worth, I had a game earlier that consisted of the enemy team (1 gold 3 silver 1 bronze) vs our team (1 silver 1 bronze 3 unranked). That in my humble opinion is a perfect example of how match making has issues. So you have my vote on that.
